name: Chicken and Mushroom Fricassée
ingredients: chicken breasts, shallots, mushrooms, white wine, chicken broth, thyme, cream, butter, flour, parsley, salt, pepper
quantities: 2 lbs chicken breasts, 6-8 shallots, 10 oz mushrooms, 1 cup white wine, 1 cup chicken broth, 2-3 sprigs thyme, 1 cup cream, 2 tbsp butter, 2 tbsp flour, fresh parsley for garnish, salt and pepper to taste
recipe:
1. Brown 2 lbs chicken breasts in 2 tbsp butter. Remove and set aside.
2. Sauté 6-8 chopped shallots and 10 oz sliced mushrooms until soft.
3. Add 1 cup white wine and deglaze the pan.
4. Add 1 cup chicken broth and 2-3 sprigs thyme, then simmer.
5. Stir in 1 cup cream and return chicken to the pan. Cook until chicken is cooked through.
6. Season with salt and pepper, garnish with fresh parsley, and serve.
